details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.4 Version and conformance level identification - Conformance level.
details.description: A Level A conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as A. A Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B. A Level U conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as U.

rule.description: A Level A conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as A. A Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B. A Level U conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as U.

error.message: The "conformance" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of "B" for PDF/A-2b conforming file.
